grtree
Class TreeScrollFrame

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Window
                    |
                    +--java.awt.Frame
                          |
                          +--grtree.TreeScrollFrame
public class TreeScrollFrame
extends java.awt.Frame

A TreeScrollFrame is a nice frame that paints its tree. The TreeScrollFrame uses a ScrollPane to move around to view the tree. The tree is drawn in the center of a TreeCanvas which is added to the ScrollPane.

See Also:
